channel.title: 317 - Sativa-OS - 24/7 VPS hosted - Gambling - 8+ Bosses - Staff Needed
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5][img]http://i.imgur.com/c3THV7w.png?1[/img] [URL=http://"http://sativa-os.weebly.com/"][Website]Click here[Website][/URL] Note: This is not gonna be the website for long, our real website is under construction. [Forums]: Currently Under Construction [Forums] [Server]Note: If you think this is all that's going to be added to server, I can promise you it's not. There will be tons of updates that will make the server better. [URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/ffe5jnioutith6b/SativaOSV1.jar?dl=1"][Client Download]>> Click here << [Client Download][/URL] [Events]=Drop party at 15 players.=[Events][FONT=Georgia]
[/FONT][/SIZE] [SPOILER=Server Features]-Redone Combat system -Training Area With different npc's in it, mostly slayer npcs. -Fishing Trawler. -All Skills Trainable. -Custom Slayer system -All bosses have extremely, rare drops. Goodluck killing the strong oldschool bosses. -07 items added. -07 bosses added. -Many bosses to kill with your friends. -Prestige system (When you prestige, You reset your combat stats. You will gain a 0.2% better drop rate and a custom title next to your name "Prestige 1" "Prestige 2" Prestige goes up to 75. -Prestige Shop -Regular barrows. -Godwars Dungeon -Mithril seeds. -Pest control. -Duel arena with Dds/whip option in duel interface. -Castle wars. -Working Bounty Hunter -Working jad/Tzhaar cave. -PKP Shop. -King Black dragon with nice loots. -Callisto is in wildy. Good drops. -Sea troll queen -The inadequacy is in wildy. uses multi-attacks. Good drops. -Ice warriors in multi-wildy with nice loots. -500m, 1b, 1.5b, 2b tickets added in-game. -Barbarian Assault -All teleports in spellbook. -Custom Donator Ranks -Custom Donator benefits w/ donator zone -Crystal Chest with decent rewards (Bosses and npcs drops them.) -Dicing -Added all shops at home. -Much more features. get on and try it out![/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Server Pictures] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JGMW2j0.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fbXprcY.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oNY06v8.png[/img]

100% Crystal Chest w/ nice rewards. Most monsters/bosses will drop crystal key. [img]http://i.imgur.com/zWUr5JC.png[/img]
100% Working Mithril seeds. [img]http://i.imgur.com/BYTSCU8.png[/img]
Prestige npc. [img]http://i.imgur.com/NaL4KiT.png[/img]
Spellbook changing by talking to brother kojo.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/z3nLgbm.png[/img]
Lock/unlock xp.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IEdsaDA.png[/img]
Duel arena.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qgprttN.png[/img]
500m, 1b, 1.5b, 2b tickets.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/JA1Cim8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zUWa2S1.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pZaI9v3.png?1[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/v3A0cRr.png?1[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/iFjeD3h.png?1[/img]
[/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Things that will be added and is currently being worked on] -Duo Slayer -Custom Boss Minigame -Boss pets -Much more. [/SPOILER] [SPOILER=Server Development Team]Owner: Relax Developer: Andrew[/SPOILER] [/CENTER]

item.title: 317 - Sativa-OS - 24/7 VPS hosted - Gambling - 8+ Bosses - Staff Needed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Fix your links mate.
This ain’t rune-server, remove the quotes from each link. It’s that simple.

I’m bored as hell, so I’ll give your server a shot. Be warned though, if this is a leach, I will find 1000001 bugs and you will be like “… fml”

Edit: didn’t even play and already irritated with your client. Upon first downloading the cache it said that “the cache has been updated” and to restart the client.
Really? Of course it updated. It’s the first time I downloaded the damn shit.

Also, add a damn mute button for the login music.

Edit 2:

Well. I played for a grip today… I mean like hours.
The server has it’s bugs, but he’s trying to fix them as he finds out about them…

Didn’t really have any complaints until the rollbacks started. He just kept updating the server over and over… Without saving accounts. I’d get the “Connection lost… reconnecting” message, get logged, and then be rolled back to the last time I logged out…
I said something about it the first time, he said he’d warn us…
Well. That lasted for like 2 updates. Then he went right back to rolling people back. I literally had to go get a new slayer task 5 times in a row because I kept being reset to when I finished.
[s]
And when I got irritated about it, he decided to tell me to stfu.

With all that being said. I’m not going to be playing anymore. I helped you from the minute I logged in, and found some pretty hefty bugs for you… And that’s your reaction? Good luck.[/s]
Apparently someone else was teamviewing the computer and was the one that said it… But the rest is still true…

Read full topic

item.title: 317 - Sativa-OS - 24/7 VPS hosted - Gambling - 8+ Bosses - Staff Needed
item.dc:creator: @sativaos sativaos
item.description:
@sativaos wrote:

[CENTER][SIZE=5]
[URL=http://“http://sativa-os.weebly.com/”][Website]Click here[Website][/URL] Note: This is not gonna be the website for long, our real website is under construction.
[Forums]: Currently Under Construction [Forums]
[Server]Note: If you think this is all that’s going to be added to server, I can promise you it’s not. There will be tons of updates that will make the server better.
[URL=http://“https://www.dropbox.com/s/ffe5jnioutith6b/SativaOSV1.jar?dl=1”][Client Download]>> Click here << [Client Download][/URL]
[Events]=Drop party at 15 players.=[Events][FONT=Georgia]

[/FONT][/SIZE]
[SPOILER=Server Features]-Redone Combat system
-Training Area With different npc’s in it, mostly slayer npcs.
-Fishing Trawler.
-All Skills Trainable.
-Custom Slayer system
-All bosses have extremely, rare drops. Goodluck killing the strong oldschool bosses.
-07 items added.
-07 bosses added.
-Many bosses to kill with your friends.
-Prestige system (When you prestige, You reset your combat stats. You will gain a 0.2% better drop rate and a custom title next to your name “Prestige 1” “Prestige 2” Prestige goes up to 75.
-Prestige Shop
-Regular barrows.
-Godwars Dungeon
-Mithril seeds.
-Pest control.
-Duel arena with Dds/whip option in duel interface.
-Castle wars.
-Working Bounty Hunter
-Working jad/Tzhaar cave.
-PKP Shop.
-King Black dragon with nice loots.
-Callisto is in wildy. Good drops.
-Sea troll queen
-The inadequacy is in wildy. uses multi-attacks. Good drops.
-Ice warriors in multi-wildy with nice loots.
-500m, 1b, 1.5b, 2b tickets added in-game.
-Barbarian Assault
-All teleports in spellbook.
-Custom Donator Ranks
-Custom Donator benefits w/ donator zone
-Crystal Chest with decent rewards (Bosses and npcs drops them.)
-Dicing
-Added all shops at home.
-Much more features. get on and try it out![/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Server Pictures]

100% Crystal Chest w/ nice rewards. Most monsters/bosses will drop crystal key.

100% Working Mithril seeds.

Prestige npc.

Spellbook changing by talking to brother kojo.

Lock/unlock xp.

Duel arena.

500m, 1b, 1.5b, 2b tickets.


[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Things that will be added and is currently being worked on]
-Duo Slayer
-Custom Boss Minigame
-Boss pets
-Much more.
[/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Server Development Team]Owner: Relax
Developer: Andrew[/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]
